h1.span: Information on Withdraw Procedures During School Closure

div.p: Although Pennsylvania schools are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year due to the coronavirus pandemic, Derry Township School District recognizes that individual circumstance may necessitate that a student withdrawing due to relocation or transfer to another educational entity. For information about withdraw procedures during the mandated school closure, please see the appropriate school-specific information below.

p.br: Please contact the appropriate HHS school counselor, through email or phone, and request withdraw paperwork. (717.531.2244)

div.p: Completed paperwork should be returned to the appropriate school counselor for processing.
Arrangements will be made for the student to retrieve personal belongings and to return district equipment (books, iPad, etc..)

p.br: Please contact the appropriate school counselor, through email or phone, and request withdraw paperwork. (717-531-2222)

div.p: Completed paperwork should be returned to the appropriate counselor for processing.
Arrangements will be made for the student to retrieve personal belongings and to return district equipment (books, iPad, etc..)

Hershey Elementary Schools Withdraw Procedures:
Please contact the appropriate assistant principal, through email or phone, and request withdraw paperwork. (717-531-2277)

Completed paperwork should be returned to the appropriate assistant principal for processing.
Arrangements will be made for the student to retrieve personal belongings and to return district equipment (books, iPad, etc..)

P. O. Box 898
30 East Granada Avenue
